job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Job Description:<br>Required Skills:<br>•	Ideal candidate should have a degree in a quantitative field (e.g., mathematics, computer science, physics, economics, engineering, statistics, operations research, quantitative social science, etc.).<br>•	Basic Knowledge on software development principles and architecture.<br>•	Good analytical and problem-solving abilities.<br>•	Ability to break down and understand complex business problems, define a solution and implement it using advanced quantitative methods.<br>•	Familiarity with programming for data analysis; ideally Python, SQL, or R.<br>•	Solid oral and written communication skills, especially around analytical concepts and methods.<br>•	Great work ethic and intellectual curiosity.<br>•	Knowledge of Cloud technologies such as AWS or Google Cloud.<br>•	Knowledge of any relational database such as My SQL.<br>•	Must be a team player with excellent communication and problem-solving skills and have experience working with customers across teams.<br>
